=By Developers=
Once the Java sources are imported in an IDE, a default build should allow to launch the applications
  * nl.!BobbinWork.viewer.gui.BWVApplet
  * nl.!BobbinWork.grids.GridGUI.!PolarGridPrinter

=Current Distributions=
  * [http://www.xs4all.nl/%7Efalkink/BobbinWork/bwViewer.jar diagrams] or as an [file:///D:/Mijn%20Documenten/Joke/WWW/BobbinWork/viewer-EN.html applet]
  * [http://www.xs4all.nl/%7Efalkink/BobbinWork/bwpGrid.jar grids]

=Desired Deployment=
Java !WebStart and !FatJar or !JarJar or whatever to make it also easily accessible for the many less computer literate lace makers who's system doesn't meet the prerequisites to execute the jar files.
